samples.name: OverView
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 treegrid component is an overview of how to display and manipulate large data with configuration options.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example shows how the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid looks with its default configuration.

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This example shows the binding of an array of list objects in the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This example shows the binding of remote services by using the DataManager in the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid.

samples.name: Self Reference
samples.description: This example illustrates binding self-referential flat data with parent ID to a Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Column Formatting
samples.description: This demo explains how to display the content of TreeGrid columns based on the specified format in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid.

samples.name: Column Template
samples.description: This demo explains how to define template columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Reorder
samples.description: This demo explains how to reorder the columns of treegrid by simple drag and drop of columns using Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Resize
samples.description: This demo explains how to resize the width of the treegrid columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Column Menu
samples.description: This demo explains the default functionalities of the Column Menu in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Cell Alignment
samples.description: This demo explains how to align the content inside the cells of treegrid columns and headers in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: AutoWrap Column Cells
samples.description: This demo explains how to wrap the content of columns within the specified width of treegrid columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Show or Hide Column
samples.description: This demo explains how to hide or show the columns of treegrid dynamically using Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid methods.

samples.name: Header Template
samples.description: This demo explains how to customize column headers to show additional HTML elements, such as icons, images, etc. in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Stacked Header
samples.description: This demo explains how to provide a common header for the group of columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Row Hover
samples.description: This demo explains how the treegrid row color is changed while move the mouse over a row in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid content.

samples.name: Row Height
samples.description: This demo explains the way of customizing the row height of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Row Template
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 TreeGrid control shows the usage of the row template feature. We have rendered each TreeGrid row using template.

samples.name: Detail Template
samples.description: This demo shows TreeGrid with detail template feature and also each row contains detailed information about a row

samples.name: Inline Editing
samples.description: This example shows how to add and edit row or cell inline on the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Dialog Editing
samples.description: This demo explains how to edit a treegrid record in the Dialog mode using Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Lock Row
samples.description: This demo explains how to disable editing for specific rows dynamically in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Cell Edit Type
samples.description: This demo explains how to set different edit types and how to define edit params for the treegrid columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Command Column
samples.description: This demo explains how to include CRUD action buttons as one of the columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Edit Template
samples.description: This demo explains how create a custom editor control for the treegrid cells when a row is edited in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid.

samples.name: Multi Sorting
samples.description: This demo demonstrates to sort multiple columns of treegrid by hold the CTRL key and click on the column headers of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Sorting API
samples.description: This demo explains how to sort columns dynamically using methods of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Default Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the default functionalities of filtering and how to define the template for filter bar in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid.

samples.name: Menu Filter
samples.description: This demo explains how to filter the content using menu filter type of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Search
samples.description: This demo explains how to search the text entered in the search bar in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid content.

samples.name: Default Paging
samples.description: This demo explains how to display the records in paginated view in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Paging API
samples.description: This demo explains how to customize a pager using the APIs that are relevant to paging of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Default Scrolling
samples.description: This demo demonstrates how to use Essential JS 2 TreeGrid to show a large data view without performance degradation by rendering only the required rows.

samples.name: virtual Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 TreeGrid control shows the usage of the horizontal and vertical scrollbars to view TreeGrid content that exceeds the TreeGrid area.

samples.name: Default Selection
samples.description: This demo explains the customization of selection mode and toggle selection of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Selection API
samples.description: This demo explains how to select and clear multiple rows using methods of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Checkbox Selection
samples.description: This demo explains how the check box selection feature can be used to select treegrid rows in Essential TypeScript TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Checkbox Column
samples.description: This demo explains how the hierarchy selection between the records using column checkboxes in Essential TypeScript TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Default Aggregate
samples.description: This demo explains how to display the summary values such as average, minimum, etc., for the columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Custom Aggregate
samples.description: This demo explains how to display the custom aggregate for the columns in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Default Context Menu
samples.description: This demo explains the usage of context menu and the default context menu items in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Custom Context Menu
samples.description: This demo explains the usage of custom context menu items in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Default Exporting
samples.description: This demo explains how to export the treegrid content to Excel, PDF, and CSV documents using the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Print
samples.description: This demo explains how to print the records of the treegrid using the Print feature of Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Conditional Formatting
samples.description: This demo explains how to apply styles to specific cells based on certain conditions in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Toolbar Template
samples.description: This demo explains how to render custom template elements in a toolbar by which any custom operation can be performed in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This demo explains the basic functionalities of the events that are available in the Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: KeyBoard Interaction
samples.description: This demo explains the key combinations used to perform corresponding treegrid actions in Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.

samples.name: Grid Lines
samples.description: This demo explains how to customize the grid lines in treegrid using Syncfusion Essential JS2 TreeGrid control.
